subject: re:Don't have time to visit local drug store
body:
Dear customer.
The pharmacy you shop at got too expensive? Why spend more if you have the opportunity to buy medications of the same generic quality for less?
Everyone knows that drug sale taxes are much lower in Canada than in the USA that's why many Americans choose to purchase their medications at CanadianPharmacy. A much lower price for drugs of the same generic quality that's what CanadianPharmacy has to offer you.
Hope that you find this advice useful. CanadianPharmacy is waiting.
Yours,Vonda Cameron
